inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

inducer_details.subject: A white SUV
inducer_details.key_action: Fails to notice the vehicle ahead braking due to low visibility.

accident_details.direct_damage: The lead car's rear is severely crumpled; the trailing car's front end is demolished.

inducer_details.subject: A taxi
inducer_details.key_action: On the slick, rainy road, the braking distance is insufficient, rear-ending a private car.

accident_details.direct_damage: Both vehicles sustain minor damage; airbags deploy.

scene.location: Waterlogged area at KPE (Kallang-Paya Lebar Expressway) tunnel exit

inducer_details.subject: A sports car
inducer_details.key_action: Hydroplanes while speeding through a puddle, rear-ending a truck.

accident_details.direct_damage: The sports car's front end wedges under the truck's rear, severely damaged.

inducer.description: Sudden Obstacle (Pedestrian / Non-motorized Vehicle Darting Out)

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Rear-facing dashcam of the car that was hit

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Slams on the brakes to avoid a pedestrian who suddenly dashed into the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The following vehicle, failing to react in time, collides with the rear.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Dashcam of the at-fault vehicle (driver's frantic shouts are audible)

scene.location: A bridge on a downward slope

inducer_details.subject: A small, fully-loaded cargo truck
inducer_details.key_action: The brakes give out completely, making it impossible to slow down.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck plows into a line of three sedans waiting at a red light.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Shaky smartphone footage from a pedestrian bystander

inducer_details.subject: A motorcycle
inducer_details.key_action: The vehicle ahead makes an emergency stop to avoid scattered bricks on the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The motorcycle, unable to stop in time, rear-ends the car and the rider is thrown.

inducer.description: Deteriorating Road Conditions (Oil Slick / Chemical Spill)

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Black and white surveillance footage style

inducer_details.subject: A delivery truck
inducer_details.key_action: Tires skid on an oil slick while braking on the exit ramp.

accident_details.direct_damage: Rear-ends the vehicle waiting for the gate to open.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: The car ahead hits a water-filled pothole, causing a sudden tire blowout and deceleration.

accident_details.direct_damage: The trailing car collides with the disabled vehicle.

inducer_details.subject: A cycling team
inducer_details.key_action: The lead cyclist brakes hard to avoid a monkey that suddenly darted out.

accident_details.direct_damage: Several cyclists behind are unable to stop, causing a chain-reaction of rear-ends and falls.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Passenger's smartphone footage from a car in the next lane

inducer_details.subject: A heavy truck
inducer_details.key_action: The small car ahead has a blowout, causing it to lose control and rapidly slow down.

accident_details.direct_damage: The following truck, unable to brake in time, pushes the small car forward for a considerable distance.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Dashcam (capturing the object falling and the car ahead braking hard)

inducer_details.subject: A panel van
inducer_details.key_action: A piece of tile from a building's facade breaks off and falls, causing the car ahead to brake in panic.

accident_details.direct_damage: The following van rear-ends the car.

inducer_details.subject: A taxi
inducer_details.key_action: The front wheels of the car ahead drop into a small, sudden sinkhole, causing the vehicle to stop abruptly.

accident_details.direct_damage: The following taxi rear-ends it.

inducer_details.subject: A motorcycle
inducer_details.key_action: Visibility is extremely poor due to the downpour, failing to see the car slowing down ahead.

accident_details.direct_damage: The motorcycle rear-ends the sedan, throwing the rider.

inducer_details.subject: A public bus
inducer_details.key_action: The small car ahead suddenly brakes to avoid splashing pedestrians on the roadside.

accident_details.direct_damage: The bus rear-ends the small car on the slick pavement.

inducer.description: Sudden Obstacle (Pedestrian / Non-motorized Vehicle Darting Out)

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Rear-facing dashcam of the car that was hit

inducer_details.subject: A food delivery e-bike
inducer_details.key_action: The car ahead slams on its brakes to avoid a delivery e-bike driving against traffic.

accident_details.direct_damage: The car behind rear-ends it.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Widespread Streetlight / Tunnel Lighting Failure)

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A sudden power outage plunges the tunnel into darkness; lead cars instinctively slow down, causing trailing cars to collide in the pitch black.

accident_details.direct_damage: A three-car pile-up ensues.

inducer_details.subject: A dump truck
inducer_details.key_action: In heavy construction dust, the lead vehicle slows down due to poor visibility and is rear-ended.

accident_details.direct_damage: The cabin of the rear truck is severely crushed.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Camera from a building diagonal to the intersection

inducer_details.subject: A public bus
inducer_details.key_action: The car ahead hesitates and slows upon seeing the malfunctioning signal (flashing yellow), but the bus driver is not paying attention.

accident_details.direct_damage: The bus lightly rear-ends the car.

inducer_details.subject: A small truck
inducer_details.key_action: Speeding through a puddle causes the vehicle to lose control, swerve, and cross the centerline.

accident_details.direct_damage: Collides head-on with a sedan traveling normally in the opposite direction.

scene.location: A bend on a mountain road

inducer_details.subject: An SUV
inducer_details.key_action: The steering system fails mid-turn, causing the vehicle to continue in a straight line.

accident_details.direct_damage: Crashes into a truck coming from the opposite direction.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Black and white surveillance footage style

inducer_details.subject: A pickup truck
inducer_details.key_action: On a road where the centerline is obscured by the rain curtain, the driver mistakenly drives down the middle.

accident_details.direct_damage: Collides with an oncoming vehicle.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Dashcam of the car that was hit

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: The front-left tire blows out, causing the vehicle to veer sharply left across the central divider.

accident_details.direct_damage: Crashes head-on with an MPV in the oncoming lane.

inducer_details.subject: An RV
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves violently into the opposite lane to avoid a large animal (e.g., deer, wild boar).

accident_details.direct_damage: Collides with an oncoming motorcycle.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Attempts to overtake in the dense fog, misjudging the distance and speed of an oncoming car.

accident_details.direct_damage: A catastrophic head-on collision occurs during the overtaking maneuver.

inducer_details.subject: A three-wheeled vehicle
inducer_details.key_action: Suddenly swerves into the oncoming lane to avoid a large pothole in the middle of the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: Collides with a sedan traveling normally in the opposite direction.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Widespread Streetlight / Tunnel Lighting Failure)

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Tunnel exit surveillance camera (capturing the flash of the impact)

scene.location: A tunnel with no central divider

inducer_details.subject: Two cars
inducer_details.key_action: In the suddenly darkened tunnel, one car drifts out of its lane.

accident_details.direct_damage: The two vehicles collide head-on in the darkness.

inducer_details.subject: A sports car
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves sharply into the oncoming lane to avoid scattered metal parts on the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: Collides with an oncoming fuel tanker.

inducer.description: Deteriorating Road Conditions (Oil Slick / Chemical Spill)

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: While accelerating out of the circle, the car hits an oil slick, causing it to fishtail into the oncoming lane.

accident_details.direct_damage: The rear of the sedan collides with the front of an oncoming car.

inducer.description: Sudden Obstacle (Pedestrian / Non-motorized Vehicle Darting Out)

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Overtakes a cyclist but must swerve into the oncoming lane to avoid hitting them.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck collides head-on with an oncoming car.

inducer_details.subject: An old truck
inducer_details.key_action: The engine suddenly loses power on the incline, causing the truck to roll backward out of control.

accident_details.direct_damage: The backward-rolling truck veers diagonally and strikes another vehicle coming up the hill.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

inducer_details.subject: A taxi and an SUV
inducer_details.key_action: All traffic lights are out; both vehicles proceed without slowing down to check for traffic.

accident_details.direct_damage: The taxi T-bones the side of the SUV, causing both cars to spin to a stop in the middle of the road.

inducer.description: Sudden Obstacle (Pedestrian / Non-motorized Vehicle Darting Out)

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Dashcam of the car that was hit

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Accelerates aggressively from a side street onto the main road to avoid an e-bike that suddenly appeared.

accident_details.direct_damage: Is hit on the side by a truck proceeding straight on the main road.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Shaky smartphone footage from a pedestrian bystander

inducer_details.subject: A sports car
inducer_details.key_action: Runs a yellow light at excessive speed during a heavy downpour.

accident_details.direct_damage: Collides with a vehicle that had just started making a left turn.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

inducer_details.subject: A van
inducer_details.key_action: Pulls out from a side road in dense fog, failing to see the oncoming traffic on the main road.

accident_details.direct_damage: Is hit on its side by a tractor on the main road.

inducer_details.subject: A cement mixer truck
inducer_details.key_action: Fails to stop before a red light due to brake failure.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck barrels into the intersection, T-boning a passing bus.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Black and white surveillance footage style

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Starting on a green light, the car skids on the icy road and drifts into the middle of the intersection.

accident_details.direct_damage: Is hit on the driver's side by a vehicle proceeding normally from the perpendicular direction.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Widespread Streetlight / Tunnel Lighting Failure)

inducer_details.subject: Two cars
inducer_details.key_action: The intersection lights are out; neither driver uses high beams or stops to check for traffic.

accident_details.direct_damage: One car hits the other's B-pillar.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Dashcam of the car that was hit

inducer_details.subject: An MPV
inducer_details.key_action: While driving in the inner lane of a roundabout, the vehicle in the outer lane loses control and fishtails due to the slippery road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The front of the out-of-control vehicle hits the side door of the MPV.

inducer_details.subject: A motorcycle
inducer_details.key_action: Takes a wider turn than usual to avoid a large pothole while turning left from a side street onto the main road.

accident_details.direct_damage: Its path overlaps with a vehicle going straight on the main road, resulting in a collision.

inducer_details.subject: A dump truck and a sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Dust impairs visibility; the sedan driver fails to see a dump truck running a red light.

accident_details.direct_damage: The sedan is T-boned and destroyed by the high-speed dump truck.

inducer_details.subject: A bicycle
inducer_details.key_action: A cyclist, waiting at a red light, slips and falls on spilled ball bearings when starting on green.

accident_details.direct_damage: The rider falls in the middle of the road and is pulled under a bus making a right turn in the same direction.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Shaky smartphone footage from a pedestrian bystander

inducer_details.subject: A three-wheeled motorcycle
inducer_details.key_action: A wheel suddenly comes off while turning at an intersection, causing the vehicle to lose control.

accident_details.direct_damage: The out-of-control three-wheeler slides sideways, hitting pedestrians waiting at the red light.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Passenger's view from a parallel vehicle

scene.location: Highway next to a national park

inducer_details.subject: An SUV
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves sharply to the left to avoid a large deer that suddenly appeared.

accident_details.direct_damage: Sideswipes a sedan driving normally in the left lane.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan driven by a novice driver
inducer_details.key_action: Oversteers while changing lanes to avoid a pothole they didn't see in time.

accident_details.direct_damage: Sideswipes a vehicle behind it in the target lane.

inducer_details.subject: A taxi
inducer_details.key_action: Accelerates too hard while merging, wheels slip on the wet road markings.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle slightly loses control and sideswipes a car going straight in the adjacent lane.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: On a snowy road, the truck's body sways due to a gust of wind or uneven road surface.

accident_details.direct_damage: The rear of the swaying truck sideswipes a small car that is overtaking it.

inducer.description: Sudden Obstacle (Pedestrian / Non-motorized Vehicle Darting Out)

inducer_details.subject: An MPV
inducer_details.key_action: An e-bike suddenly darts out from the roadside on the right; the MPV swerves left to avoid it.

accident_details.direct_damage: Sideswipes a bus driving normally in the left lane.

inducer_details.subject: An SUV
inducer_details.key_action: The vehicle on the left suddenly has a tire blowout, loses control, and veers to the right.

accident_details.direct_damage: The SUV with the blown tire sideswipes a sedan driving normally on the right.

inducer.description: Deteriorating Road Conditions (Oil Slick / Chemical Spill)

inducer_details.subject: A motorcycle
inducer_details.key_action: While riding in the inner lane of the roundabout, it hits a leaked oil slick, causing the rear wheel to slide slightly.

accident_details.direct_damage: To stabilize the bike, the rider instinctively adjusts the steering, sideswiping a car in the outer lane.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Widespread Streetlight / Tunnel Lighting Failure)

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: The lighting suddenly goes out; the driver nervously veers slightly from the lane.

accident_details.direct_damage: Sideswipes another vehicle that is also navigating in the dark in the adjacent lane.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Black and white surveillance footage style

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: In the dense fog, the driver cannot see the lane lines and the vehicle slowly drifts.

accident_details.direct_damage: Sideswipes another vehicle also driving slowly in the adjacent lane.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Power steering suddenly fails, the steering wheel becomes heavy, and the vehicle sways while correcting its course.

accident_details.direct_damage: Sideswipes the mirror of an oncoming vehicle.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Makes an emergency lane change to avoid a plastic barrel that fell from a truck ahead.

accident_details.direct_damage: Fails to check properly before changing lanes and sideswipes a vehicle in the adjacent lane.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Filmed by a pedestrian on a mobile phone

inducer_details.subject: A tractor
inducer_details.key_action: Is being forcefully overtaken by an impatient sedan in the dust.

accident_details.direct_damage: The sedan misjudges the space in low visibility and sideswipes the tractor.

inducer_details.subject: Two parallel vehicles
inducer_details.key_action: The vehicle on the left passes over a significant section of subsided road, causing the car body to suddenly sink and tilt to the right.

accident_details.direct_damage: This causes it to sideswipe the vehicle driving normally on the right.

inducer_details.subject: A convertible sports car
inducer_details.key_action: A small billboard falls; the driver is startled and swerves sharply.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle veers out of its lane and sideswipes a vehicle in the adjacent lane.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

inducer_details.subject: Two turning vehicles
inducer_details.key_action: The traffic light is malfunctioning; two vehicles turning left together in adjacent lanes get too close while trying to get ahead.

accident_details.direct_damage: A sideswipe occurs during the turn.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Aerial drone footage (gradually becomes clear in the dense fog)

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: The lead car brakes suddenly due to a sharp drop in visibility; vehicles behind fail to react in time.

accident_details.direct_damage: A series of rear-end collisions occur, leading to a pile-up of dozens of vehicles in a chaotic scene.

inducer.description: Deteriorating Road Conditions (Oil Slick / Chemical Spill)

inducer_details.subject: Multiple sedans
inducer_details.key_action: A truck leaks an oil slick, causing several following cars to skid and lose control when braking on the curve.

accident_details.direct_damage: The out-of-control vehicles collide with each other, forming a multi-car pile-up.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Dashcam of a vehicle stuck behind (view obscured by heavy rain)

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: Extremely low visibility due to heavy rain; after one car loses control, a chain of rear-end collisions follows.

accident_details.direct_damage: Wrecked vehicles are scattered about; the injured wait for rescue in the rain.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A truck spills a large amount of rolling pipes; vehicles behind swerve and brake suddenly.

accident_details.direct_damage: The evasive maneuvers cause chaos, leading to multiple rear-end collisions and sideswipes in a scene of total mess.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A fully loaded truck has a tire blowout on the bridge, loses control, and comes to a stop sideways across the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: Vehicles behind cannot avoid it in time, causing a pile-up, with some vehicles crashing into the truck.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A large billboard is blown down by the wind, hitting a car and causing the vehicles behind to brake hard.

accident_details.direct_damage: Leads to a multi-car rear-end collision.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Widespread Streetlight / Tunnel Lighting Failure)

inducer_details.subject: A convoy of vehicles
inducer_details.key_action: The lighting in the tunnel suddenly goes out completely; the lead car brakes hard.

accident_details.direct_damage: The following vehicles rear-end each other in the darkness, forming a long chain of cars.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A herd of deer suddenly crosses the highway; the lead car brakes hard.

accident_details.direct_damage: Triggers a long chain of rear-end collisions.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Dashcam of a rear vehicle in the struck convoy

inducer_details.subject: A heavy truck and multiple sedans
inducer_details.key_action: The truck's brakes fail, and it speeds towards a line of cars waiting at a red light.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck continuously hits and runs over multiple sedans, causing catastrophic consequences.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: The lead car loses control on the wet curve; vehicles behind brake and swerve to avoid, causing chaos.

accident_details.direct_damage: Multiple cars collide and rear-end each other in the confusion.

inducer.description: Sudden Obstacle (Pedestrian / Non-motorized Vehicle Darting Out)

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Top-down shot from a tall building

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A motorcycle illegally crosses the expressway, causing vehicles in multiple lanes to brake hard.

accident_details.direct_damage: Triggers a three-lane multi-car rear-end chain.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A car gets stuck in a subsided area of the road and stops suddenly; the car behind swerves to avoid it.

accident_details.direct_damage: The swerving vehicle collides with a car in the adjacent lane, which in turn triggers a rear-end collision from behind.

inducer.description: Sudden Obstacle (Pedestrian / Non-motorized Vehicle Darting Out)

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: A student suddenly runs out from behind a parked car, crossing the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The sedan is unable to brake in time and hits the student.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: View from a customer inside a coffee shop (filming outside)

inducer_details.subject: A taxi
inducer_details.key_action: Drifts and loses control while turning on a snowy road, fails to stop in time before the crosswalk.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle slides towards the sidewalk, hitting pedestrians crossing the road.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Widespread Streetlight / Tunnel Lighting Failure)

inducer_details.subject: A food delivery e-bike
inducer_details.key_action: The streetlight is out; the e-bike is driving at high speed without its lights on.

accident_details.direct_damage: Hits a pedestrian taking a walk on the roadside.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Brakes fail, unable to stop before the red light and crosswalk.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck runs past the stop line and hits pedestrians crossing the road.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: In dense fog, the driver's visibility is poor and fails to see an elderly person crossing the road after leaving the park.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle hits the elderly person.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Filmed by a pedestrian on a mobile phone

inducer_details.subject: A right-turning vehicle
inducer_details.key_action: The traffic light is malfunctioning; a pedestrian mistakenly thinks it's safe to cross the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The right-turning vehicle has a blind spot, does not see the pedestrian, and a collision occurs.

inducer_details.subject: A motorcycle
inducer_details.key_action: Sharply turns to avoid a puddle and loses control on the slippery road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The out-of-control motorcycle crashes onto the platform, hitting a pedestrian waiting for the bus.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: The driver is focused on avoiding a suddenly appearing animal and does not notice a pedestrian on the roadside.

accident_details.direct_damage: While swerving to avoid the animal, the side of the car hits a pedestrian walking on the roadside.

inducer_details.subject: An electric scooter

accident_details.direct_damage: Hits a pedestrian walking normally on the sidewalk.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: A drunk person suddenly climbs over the guardrail and crosses the expressway.

accident_details.direct_damage: The sedan is traveling at high speed and is completely unable to avoid, resulting in a tragic collision.

inducer_details.subject: A three-wheeled vehicle
inducer_details.key_action: Visibility is obstructed by dust, fails to see a pedestrian waiting for a bus on the roadside.

accident_details.direct_damage: The three-wheeled vehicle hits the pedestrian.

inducer_details.subject: A bicycle
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control on the icy sidewalk.

inducer_details.key_action: A pedestrian is tripped by a rope left on the road while crossing.

accident_details.direct_damage: The fallen pedestrian is run over by the turning vehicle.

inducer_details.key_action: A child suddenly runs out from a blind spot, chasing a ball.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle, just exiting the parking lot, hits the child despite its low speed.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan

inducer_details.subject: A motorcycle
inducer_details.key_action: Visibility is obstructed by dust, fails to see a farm vehicle turning ahead.

accident_details.direct_damage: The motorcycle hits the side of the farm vehicle and falls.

inducer_details.subject: An e-bike and a sedan
inducer_details.key_action: The traffic light is malfunctioning; both the e-bike and the sedan assume they have the right of way and proceed.

inducer_details.subject: A bicycle
inducer_details.key_action: Suddenly swerves to avoid a glass bottle on the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: Sideswipes a bus traveling in the same direction and falls.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: An e-bike without lights suddenly turns left from the darkness.

accident_details.direct_damage: The sedan is unable to avoid it and hits it.

inducer_details.key_action: A motorcyclist in a dark raincoat is not visible on the rainy night; the sedan doesn't notice when turning.

accident_details.direct_damage: The sedan hits the straight-moving motorcycle while turning.

inducer_details.subject: A motorcycle
inducer_details.key_action: While driving at high speed, the wheel gets stuck in a large pothole, causing the vehicle to lose control.

accident_details.direct_damage: The out-of-control motorcycle veers into the oncoming lane and collides with an approaching vehicle.

inducer_details.subject: A bicycle
inducer_details.key_action: The bicycle's brakes fail while going downhill.

accident_details.direct_damage: The bicycle, unable to slow down, rushes into the T-junction and is hit by a truck on the main road.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: While reversing on a dimly lit road, fails to see a bicycle without lights approaching from behind.

accident_details.direct_damage: The rear of the car hits the bicycle.

inducer_details.subject: A motorcycle
inducer_details.key_action: A dog suddenly runs out; the motorcyclist brakes hard and swerves.

accident_details.direct_damage: The motorcycle loses control, slides, and hits a tree on the roadside.

inducer.description: Sudden Obstacle (Non-motorized vehicle driving against traffic)

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Driving normally on a one-way street, is hit head-on by an e-bike going the wrong way.

accident_details.direct_damage: Head-on collision, the e-bike is severely damaged.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Black and white surveillance footage style

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Driving too fast, loses control and skids on the wet curve.

accident_details.direct_damage: The side of the vehicle hits the outer guardrail, deforming the car body.

inducer_details.subject: An SUV
inducer_details.key_action: In heavy rain, due to high speed and standing water, the vehicle aquaplanes on the ramp curve.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control and hits the concrete barrier on the outer side of the ramp.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: The left front tire suddenly blows out, causing the vehicle to veer sharply to the left.

accident_details.direct_damage: The driver cannot control the vehicle and hits the central median barrier.

inducer_details.subject: A pickup truck
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves sharply to avoid a wild boar that suddenly appeared.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control and hits the guardrail on the other side of the road.

inducer_details.subject: A public bus
inducer_details.key_action: Steering fails while entering roundabout, unable to complete the turn.

accident_details.direct_damage: The bus veers off tangentially and hits the central island's guardrail.

inducer_details.subject: A race car
inducer_details.key_action: Loses traction on a patch of leaked oil during a high-speed turn.

accident_details.direct_damage: The car spins out of control off the track and collides with the tire barrier.

inducer.description: Sudden Obstacle (Pedestrian / Non-motorized Vehicle Darting Out)

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves violently to avoid a pedestrian running a red light.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control and mounts the curb, damaging its tires and rims.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: The right wheels hit a deep pothole at high speed, causing the vehicle to veer sharply to the right.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck destroys several dozen meters of the guardrail on the right.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Cannot see the ramp's curve in the dense fog and turns too sharply.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle collides with the inner guardrail of the ramp.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Driver panics and misjudges steering after being blinded by spray from a large truck.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle veers off course and collides with the guardrail.

inducer_details.subject: A motorcycle
inducer_details.key_action: Performs an emergency swerve to avoid a wooden plank on the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The motorcycle loses control and hits the roadside barrier.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Roadside camera (affected by wind and sand)

inducer_details.subject: A panel van
inducer_details.key_action: Strong crosswinds make the van unstable.

accident_details.direct_damage: The van is blown off its lane and collides with the guardrail.

inducer_details.subject: A manual transmission car
inducer_details.key_action: The engine suddenly loses power and stalls on the incline, causing the car to roll backward.

accident_details.direct_damage: The driver panics and loses control of the steering, causing the rear of the car to hit the guardrail on the curve.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Widespread Streetlight / Tunnel Lighting Failure)

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: The tunnel suddenly goes completely dark, and the driver steers by instinct.

accident_details.direct_damage: Fails to judge the curve's radius correctly and hits the inner wall (or guardrail).

inducer_details.subject: A private car
inducer_details.key_action: Driving at night, suddenly spots a huge pothole ahead and swerves sharply to avoid it.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control and hits a roadside tree, the front end is severely deformed.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Driving too fast in the rain, loses control while turning.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle fishtails and knocks down a traffic sign pole.

scene.location: T-junction at the bottom of a long downhill

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Brakes overheat and fail on a long downhill, unable to stop at the intersection.

accident_details.direct_damage: To avoid entering the intersection, the driver chooses to crash into a thick tree on the roadside.

inducer_details.subject: An SUV
inducer_details.key_action: Skids on a snowy road, vehicle veers off the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle runs off the road and breaks a lamppost.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Emergency evasive manoeuvre to avoid an animal crossing the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, runs off the road and hits a tree.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Shaky smartphone footage from a pedestrian bystander

inducer_details.subject: A public bus
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control after a blowout.

accident_details.direct_damage: The bus slowly mounts the sidewalk and is stopped by a lamppost.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control on an icy corner.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle flies off at a tangent and crashes into trees on the outside of the bend.

inducer.description: Sudden Obstacle (Pedestrian / Non-motorized Vehicle Darting Out)

inducer_details.subject: A car
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves violently to avoid a pedestrian who suddenly ran out from the roadside.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle mounts the sidewalk and knocks down a lamppost.

inducer_details.subject: A motorcycle
inducer_details.key_action: The rear wheel slips on an oil patch while exiting the petrol station.

accident_details.direct_damage: The motorcycle loses control, falls, and slides into the exit signpost.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Drives too far to the right in the fog, unable to see the edge of the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The right side of the car scrapes along a line of trees.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Running over a metal part on the road causes a blowout.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the blowout, the vehicle loses control and hits a roadside traffic information gantry.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Surveillance video from a roadside shop

inducer_details.subject: A convertible
inducer_details.key_action: A billboard from an old building is blown off by strong wind, landing on the moving convertible, startling the driver who loses control.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle drives onto the sidewalk and crashes into a shop's display window.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: The driver mistakes the accelerator for the brake.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle crashes through the parking lot guardrail and hits the exterior wall of the restaurant on the cliff edge.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Surveillance from inside a toll booth

inducer_details.subject: A heavy semi-trailer truck
inducer_details.key_action: Fails to see the toll plaza in advance due to dense fog and cannot brake in time.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck destroys a toll booth and a barrier gate.

inducer.description: Sudden Obstacle (Pedestrian / Non-motorized Vehicle Darting Out)

inducer_details.subject: A van
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves sharply to avoid a pedestrian running across the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, crashes into roadside stalls, and collapses a canopy.

scene.location: Adjacent to a row of buildings

inducer_details.subject: A mixer truck
inducer_details.key_action: The ground beneath the road suddenly collapses due to excavation beneath.

accident_details.direct_damage: The mixer truck half-falls into the cavity, tilts and strikes the neighbouring building wall.

inducer_details.subject: A car
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control after a blowout.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle mounts the sidewalk and hits the building's facade.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Fails to brake in time on the slippery downhill ramp.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle hits the parking garage wall or roller shutter.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Phone footage from a passenger inside the car

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: The accelerator gets stuck while queuing, causing the vehicle to lurch forward.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle hits the wall of the pick-up window.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Skids on the icy road, driver unable to control it.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle crashes into the corner of an apartment building.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

inducer_details.subject: A heavy truck
inducer_details.key_action: Runs a malfunctioning red light, causing another car to swerve violently.

accident_details.direct_damage: The swerving car loses control and crashes into a corner store.

composition.description: Collision with an existing obstacle on the road (e.g., broken-down vehicle, debris)

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Widespread Streetlight / Tunnel Lighting Failure)

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Trailing car's dashcam, extremely dark footage

inducer_details.subject: A sports car
inducer_details.key_action: The lighting in the tunnel suddenly goes out completely, fails to see a broken-down truck ahead.

accident_details.direct_damage: The sports car rear-ends the stationary truck at high speed; the car is totaled.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Driving in dense fog, fails to notice a vehicle stopped ahead due to an accident in time.

accident_details.direct_damage: The sedan hits the stationary accident vehicle, causing a secondary accident.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: The vehicle is driving at high speed at night and fails to see large debris (like furniture) scattered on the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle hits the obstacle directly; the chassis is severely damaged, and the vehicle loses control.

inducer_details.subject: A car
inducer_details.key_action: Visibility is obstructed in the heavy rain, fails to see a vehicle broken down ahead due to flooding.

accident_details.direct_damage: A rear-end collision occurs.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: The small car ahead has a blowout after hitting a pothole and stops in the middle of the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The following truck is unable to brake in time and hits the stopped car.

scene.location: Mountain road bend with no shoulder

inducer_details.subject: A motorcycle
inducer_details.key_action: A car's engine dies and it stops on the bend without hazard lights.

accident_details.direct_damage: The motorcyclist fails to see the stationary car in time and collides with its rear.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: A large tire detaches from a truck ahead and lands in the lane.

accident_details.direct_damage: The following sedan is unable to avoid it and hits the tire, sustaining damage.

inducer_details.subject: A public bus
inducer_details.key_action: A small car gets stuck in a sinkhole, becoming an immobile obstacle.

accident_details.direct_damage: The following bus, due to a blind spot, fails to notice it in time and collides with it.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: A small tree is blown down by the wind and is lying across the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: With poor visibility in the sandstorm, the sedan hits the fallen tree.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: A truck ahead suffers a critical failure and rolls over, blocking the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The following sedan is unable to brake in time and hits the overturned truck's trailer.

inducer_details.subject: A box truck
inducer_details.key_action: Brakes on an icy downhill bend, causing the vehicle's body to skid sideways.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle slowly tips over onto its side, spilling its cargo.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Fixed camera in the roundabout's central island

inducer_details.subject: A flatbed truck
inducer_details.key_action: The steering system suddenly fails upon entering the roundabout, making the turn impossible, and the driver applies the emergency brake.

accident_details.direct_damage: Due to centrifugal force and sudden braking, the truck tips over towards the outside of the roundabout.

inducer_details.subject: An SUV with a high center of gravity
inducer_details.key_action: At high speed, one side of the vehicle's wheels hit a deep pothole, causing the body to rock violently.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses its balance and rolls over.

inducer_details.subject: A large passenger bus
inducer_details.key_action: A front tire blows out at high speed, causing the vehicle to lose control.

accident_details.direct_damage: The bus loses control, hits the guardrail, rebounds and rolls over.

inducer_details.subject: A small truck
inducer_details.key_action: Driving too fast on a wet, curved on-ramp.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle's centrifugal force is too great, causing it to roll over.

inducer_details.subject: A container truck
inducer_details.key_action: Encounters a strong crosswind; the empty container has a large surface area.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck is blown off balance by the strong wind and rolls over.

inducer_details.subject: An SUV
inducer_details.key_action: Runs over an obstacle (like a block of wood) at high speed.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle is launched by the obstacle and loses balance upon landing, causing it to roll over.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control on an oily, wet corner.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle skids sideways and rolls over.

inducer_details.subject: A mixer truck
inducer_details.key_action: One side of the vehicle sinks into a sudden ground settlement.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle overturns due to the large height difference on its sides.

inducer.description: Sudden Obstacle (Pedestrian / Non-motorized Vehicle Darting Out)

inducer_details.subject: An SUV
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves sharply at high speed to avoid a pedestrian running a red light.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control and rolls over due to the excessive evasive maneuver.

inducer_details.subject: An off-road vehicle
inducer_details.key_action: Driving at high speed over sand dunes, the vehicle becomes airborne and lands unstablely.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control upon landing and rolls over.

inducer_details.subject: A van
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves violently to avoid an animal, driving onto the road shoulder.

accident_details.direct_damage: The soft and uneven shoulder causes the vehicle to lose balance and roll over.

inducer_details.subject: A tanker truck
inducer_details.key_action: The truck drives through a small, unnoticed chemical spill from another source. The chemical is a powerful solvent that rapidly degrades rubber.

accident_details.direct_damage: Within minutes, one of the truck's front tires is critically damaged by the chemical, leading to a sudden blowout at speed. The subsequent loss of control causes the tanker truck to roll over.

inducer_details.subject: A public bus
inducer_details.key_action: The roadbed, undermined by rain, suddenly collapses; the bus is unable to avoid it.

accident_details.direct_damage: Half of the bus falls into the collapsed area, eventually running into the roadside grass.

inducer_details.subject: An RV
inducer_details.key_action: A truck ahead drops a large number of boxes; the RV driver swerves sharply to avoid.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, runs off the embankment, and comes to a stop on the beach.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Driving too fast on an icy corner, the vehicle is unable to turn.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle continues straight off the road at a tangent, falling down a small slope.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: An accident occurs ahead; the sedan swerves off the road to avoid it.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle drives into a roadside drainage ditch.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Brakes fail, unable to stop at the intersection.

accident_details.direct_damage: The driver chooses to drive into the field opposite the intersection to use it as a buffer to stop.

inducer_details.subject: An SUV
inducer_details.key_action: A blowout occurs at high speed, causing the vehicle to lose control.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, rolls over multiple times, and runs off the road.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves violently to avoid a large animal.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control and crashes into the woods.

inducer_details.subject: A motorcycle
inducer_details.key_action: Steers onto the shoulder to avoid a large pothole.

accident_details.direct_damage: The soft shoulder causes the motorcycle to lose control and run into the adjacent field.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Fails to see the bend in the dense fog, mistaking it for a straight road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle drives straight off the road at the bend and into a ditch.

inducer_details.subject: A sports car
inducer_details.key_action: Drives over an oil patch on the corner, causing the vehicle to lose control.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle spins and runs off the track, getting stuck in the gravel trap.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Widespread Streetlight / Tunnel Lighting Failure)

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: After driving through a dark tunnel, is suddenly faced with bright light at the exit, causing temporary blindness.

accident_details.direct_damage: The driver is unable to see the road and drives off of it.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: With extremely low visibility, is unable to see the edge of the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle veers off the road and gets stuck in the sand.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Dashcam of a vehicle on the road below (looking up)

scene.location: Top level of a multi-level interchange

inducer_details.subject: A cement mixer truck
inducer_details.key_action: Complete brake failure on a downhill curve, unable to steer.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle breaks through the guardrail and falls from the overpass onto the road below.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Driving at high speed on an icy bridge, loses control and skids.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle breaks through the guardrail and plunges into the icy water.

inducer_details.subject: An overloaded truck
inducer_details.key_action: Drives onto the bridge, exceeding its load limit.

accident_details.direct_damage: The center of the bridge suddenly collapses, and the truck falls into the river with it.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Torrential Rain / Typhoon)

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Footage from a tourist's mobile phone on a boat below

inducer_details.subject: A panel van
inducer_details.key_action: Is hit by an extremely strong crosswind on the bridge, causing the vehicle to lift.

accident_details.direct_damage: The van is blown over, goes over the guardrail and falls into the sea.

inducer_details.subject: A car
inducer_details.key_action: A blowout occurs at high speed, causing the vehicle to lose control.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control and hits the guardrail, the immense impact flipping it over the edge.

inducer_details.subject: A motorcycle
inducer_details.key_action: At high speed, fails to see a large obstacle on the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The motorcycle hits the obstacle, and the rider is thrown over the guardrail, falling to the ground below.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

inducer_details.subject: A car
inducer_details.key_action: Gets lost in the dense fog and mistakenly enters an unfinished section of the bridge.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle drives straight off the end of the unfinished bridge and falls.

inducer_details.subject: A car being chased
inducer_details.key_action: The brakes fail, and it's unable to stop before the broken section of the bridge.

accident_details.direct_damage: The car jumps the gap but fails to reach the other side, plunging into the valley below.

inducer_details.subject: A tourist bus
inducer_details.key_action: All lights on the bridge go out, driver misjudges the edge of the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The bus veers slightly off course in the dark and drives off the side of the bridge.

inducer_details.subject: A convertible
inducer_details.key_action: A large steel beam falls from a crane onto the bridge.

accident_details.direct_damage: The beam's impact causes a section of the bridge to collapse, and the car falls with it.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Action camera mounted on a motorcycle's handlebars

inducer_details.subject: A motorcycle
inducer_details.key_action: The motorcycle hits a large, deep pothole near the edge of the bridge, causing the handlebars to be violently wrenched from the rider's grip.

accident_details.direct_damage: The loss of control sends the motorcycle and rider directly over the low guardrail, plunging into the river below.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Telephoto shot from a driver's mobile phone on the roadside

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: The vehicle's undercarriage catches flammable material (like cotton) dropped from a truck ahead, which ignites from friction.

accident_details.direct_damage: After pulling over, the fire starts from under the car and eventually engulfs the entire vehicle.

inducer_details.subject: An old car
inducer_details.key_action: Due to aging wiring, custom modifications, or prolonged idling, the engine overheats, causing an electrical short.

accident_details.direct_damage: White smoke first appears from under the hood, quickly turning to black smoke and then open flames.

inducer_details.subject: A car
inducer_details.key_action: An old fuel line ruptures, and leaking gasoline comes into contact with hot engine components.

accident_details.direct_damage: A fire suddenly starts under the vehicle and quickly spreads to the entire car.

inducer_details.subject: A public bus
inducer_details.key_action: The engine overheats in the tunnel, seizes, and catches fire.

accident_details.direct_damage: Thick smoke quickly fills the tunnel as passengers evacuate; the vehicle is consumed by flames.

inducer_details.subject: An electric vehicle
inducer_details.key_action: A thermal runaway event occurs in the battery, causing an internal short.

accident_details.direct_damage: Thick smoke and popping sounds come from the underfloor battery compartment, followed by fire.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Drives through a spilled chemical that is corrosive and flammable.

accident_details.direct_damage: The chemical reacts with the hot tires or exhaust, causing a fire.

inducer_details.subject: A fuel truck
inducer_details.key_action: A sinkhole opens up, causing the truck's tank to rupture as it falls.

accident_details.direct_damage: Sparks from the scraping metal ignite the leaking fuel.

inducer_details.subject: A car
inducer_details.key_action: A detached exhaust pipe scrapes along the ground, creating sparks.

accident_details.direct_damage: The sparks ignite a minor oil leak from the engine, leading to a vehicle fire.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

inducer_details.subject: An old car
inducer_details.key_action: Forced to stop-and-go repeatedly due to a malfunctioning light, the engine overheats.

accident_details.direct_damage: The overheated engine catches fire in the middle of the crowded intersection.

inducer_details.subject: A heavily loaded truck
inducer_details.key_action: The engine is under extreme strain climbing a steep hill, leading to a catastrophic failure.

accident_details.direct_damage: Oil and other flammable fluids are sprayed onto the hot exhaust manifold, igniting a fire.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Thermal camera view from a fire department drone

inducer_details.subject: An older luxury sedan
inducer_details.key_action: The catalytic converter malfunctions and overheats to an extreme temperature, glowing bright red.

accident_details.direct_damage: The superheated converter ignites the car's underbody heat shielding and floor carpets, starting a fire that rapidly spreads through the vehicle's interior.

inducer_details.subject: A tractor
inducer_details.key_action: The exhaust pipe gets clogged with dry straw.

accident_details.direct_damage: The hot exhaust ignites the straw, causing the vehicle to catch fire.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Tunnel interior camera, violent shake then signal loss

inducer_details.subject: An old fuel tanker
inducer_details.key_action: A fuel system malfunction leads to a fire while the engine is under load.

accident_details.direct_damage: The fire heats the tanker, causing a violent explosion.

inducer_details.subject: A car
inducer_details.key_action: An electrical short creates a spark during refueling.

accident_details.direct_damage: The spark ignites fuel vapors, causing the car and the pump to explode.

inducer_details.subject: An LNG (Liquefied Natural Gas) bus
inducer_details.key_action: A blowout causes the wheel rim to scrape against the pavement, creating intense heat and sparks.

accident_details.direct_damage: The sparks ignite a potential gas leak, causing the storage tank to explode.

inducer_details.subject: A truck carrying gas cylinders
inducer_details.key_action: The truck hits a large, sharp piece of metal debris on the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The impact punctures one or more cylinders, leading to a gas leak which is then ignited by sparks from the collision, causing an explosion.

inducer_details.subject: A heavy vehicle
inducer_details.key_action: A sinkhole opens up, rupturing an underground gas pipeline.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle's engine or sparks from scraping metal ignite the leaking gas, causing a massive explosion that consumes the vehicle.

inducer_details.subject: A hydrogen fuel cell vehicle
inducer_details.key_action: A critical malfunction occurs in the fuel cell system.

accident_details.direct_damage: A catastrophic failure leads to the rupture and explosion of the high-pressure hydrogen tank.

inducer_details.subject: A fuel tanker
inducer_details.key_action: The driver misses the crossing signals in the pouring rain and gets stuck on the tracks.

accident_details.direct_damage: A high-speed train collides with the tanker, causing a massive explosion.

inducer_details.subject: A car
inducer_details.key_action: The car drives through a spill of a hypergolic (self-igniting) chemical.

accident_details.direct_damage: The chemical reaction ignites the car's tires and fuel tank, leading to an explosion.

inducer_details.subject: A truck carrying explosives
inducer_details.key_action: A heavy object falls from a building under construction and lands directly on the truck's cargo.

accident_details.direct_damage: The impact detonates the explosives, causing a devastating explosion.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

inducer_details.subject: A car and a tanker truck
inducer_details.key_action: A malfunctioning traffic light causes a severe T-bone collision.

accident_details.direct_damage: The collision ruptures the tanker, and sparks from the crash ignite the spilled fuel, causing an explosion.

inducer_details.subject: An electric car with a faulty battery
inducer_details.key_action: While charging, the battery suffers a catastrophic failure.

accident_details.direct_damage: The battery pack explodes violently, destroying the car and damaging nearby vehicles and the parking structure.

inducer_details.subject: A tanker truck
inducer_details.key_action: Runs over a sharp piece of metal debris that punctures the tank.

accident_details.direct_damage: Flammable liquid leaks and is ignited by sparks, leading to a massive explosion.
